nodes.text: The Falley Club was one of a number of exclusive private clubs on Estalle Island. The establishment, located on the planet Procopia, was over one thousand years old during the Galactic Civil War and catered for the most important noble families in Tapani society.

Membership to the Falley Club was not linked with house affiliation but to prevent unpleasant rivalries house partisans and firebrands tended to be discouraged from joining. The club favored intellectuals, academics and military careerists.
